marker.ph: <<Grid> <ItemsControl x:Name="InventoryGrid" ItemsSource="{Binding InventoryAreaCollectionView/SlotList}" > <ItemsControl.ItemsPanel> <!-- specify the panel that is the container for the items --> <ItemsPanelTemplate> <UniformGrid Rows="10" Columns="10" /> </ItemsPanelTemplate> </ItemsControl.ItemsPanel> <!-- specify the template used to render each item --> <ItemsControl.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <!-- How to display each "inventory slot of the collection" --> <ContentControl> <local:SlotView/> </ContentControl> </DataTemplate> </ItemsControl.ItemTemplate> </ItemsControl> </Grid>.../>

<<ItemsControl x:Name="InventoryGrid" ItemsSource="{Binding InventoryAreaCollectionView/SlotList}" > <ItemsControl.ItemsPanel> <!-- specify the panel that is the container for the items --> <ItemsPanelTemplate> <UniformGrid Rows="10" Columns="10" /> </ItemsPanelTemplate> </ItemsControl.ItemsPanel> <!-- specify the template used to render each item --> <ItemsControl.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <!-- How to display each "inventory slot of the collection" --> <ContentControl> <local:SlotView/> </ContentControl> </DataTemplate> </ItemsControl.ItemTemplate> </ItemsControl>.../>

<<ItemsControl.ItemsPanel> <!-- specify the panel that is the container for the items --> <ItemsPanelTemplate> <UniformGrid Rows="10" Columns="10" /> </ItemsPanelTemplate> </ItemsControl.ItemsPanel> <ItemsControl.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <!-- How to display each "inventory slot of the collection" --> <ContentControl> <local:SlotView/> </ContentControl> </DataTemplate> </ItemsControl.ItemTemplate>.../>
<<ItemsPanelTemplate> <UniformGrid Rows="10" Columns="10" /> </ItemsPanelTemplate>.../>
<<UniformGrid Rows="10" Columns="10" />.../>
<<DataTemplate> <!-- How to display each "inventory slot of the collection" --> <ContentControl> <local:SlotView/> </ContentControl> </DataTemplate>.../>
<<ContentControl> <local:SlotView/> </ContentControl>.../>

<<Grid> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- Box Contents --> <RowDefinition Height="4*" /> <!-- Item Description --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ContentControl Name="InventoryContents" Grid.Row="0"> <local:InventoryContentsView/> </ContentControl> <ContentControl Name="ItemContents" Grid.Row="1"> <local:ItemDescriptionView/> </ContentControl> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- Box Contents --> <RowDefinition Height="4*" /> <!-- Item Description --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ContentControl Name="InventoryContents" Grid.Row="0"> <local:InventoryContentsView/> </ContentControl> <ContentControl Name="ItemContents" Grid.Row="1"> <local:ItemDescriptionView/> </ContentControl>.../>
<<RowDefinition Height="4*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" />.../>

<<Grid> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height= "1*" /> <RowDefinition Height= "4*" /> <RowDefinition Height= "1*" /> <RowDefinition Height= "1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width = "1*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width = "3*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width = "1*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <!-- TODO - Properly bind this list God Have Mercy on My Soul The list should be inventory slot bound, the inventory slot get should simply be generating a view from the item list appropiate to the slot type--> <ComboBox Grid.Column = "0" Grid.Row = "0" Grid.ColumnSpan="3"/>
<Grid Grid.Column = "0" Grid.Row = "1"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="3*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Image Source="{Binding Item/StarPath}" Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Visibility="{Binding Item/Mega}"/> <Image Source="{Binding Item/LevelPath}" Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Visibility="{Binding Item/Level}"/> <Image Source="{Binding Item/ItemImagePath}" Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Grid.RowSpan="2"/> </Grid>
<TextBlock Text="Rarity: " Grid.Column = "0" Grid.Row = "2"/> <TextBlock Text="Value: " Grid.Column = "0" Grid.Row = "3"/>
<TextBlock Text="{Binding Item/description}" Grid.Column = "1" Grid.Row = "1"/> <TextBlock Text="{Binding Item/rarity}" Grid.Column = "1" Grid.Row = "2"/> <TextBlock Text="{Binding Item/sellPrice}" Grid.Column = "1" Grid.Row = "3"/>
<TextBlock Text="Count" Grid.Column = "2" Grid.Row = "2"/> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Grid.Column = "2" Grid.Row = "3" Minimum="{Binding Item/MinCount}" Maximum="{Binding Item/MaxCount}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Value = "{Binding Amount, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding Item/CanIncrease}"/> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height= "1*" /> <RowDefinition Height= "4*" /> <RowDefinition Height= "1*" /> <RowDefinition Height= "1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width = "1*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width = "3*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width = "1*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ComboBox Grid.Column = "0" Grid.Row = "0" Grid.ColumnSpan="3"/> <Grid Grid.Column = "0" Grid.Row = "1"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="3*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Image Source="{Binding Item/StarPath}" Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Visibility="{Binding Item/Mega}"/> <Image Source="{Binding Item/LevelPath}" Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Visibility="{Binding Item/Level}"/> <Image Source="{Binding Item/ItemImagePath}" Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Grid.RowSpan="2"/> </Grid> <TextBlock Text="Rarity: " Grid.Column = "0" Grid.Row = "2"/> <TextBlock Text="Value: " Grid.Column = "0" Grid.Row = "3"/> <TextBlock Text="{Binding Item/description}" Grid.Column = "1" Grid.Row = "1"/> <TextBlock Text="{Binding Item/rarity}" Grid.Column = "1" Grid.Row = "2"/> <TextBlock Text="{Binding Item/sellPrice}" Grid.Column = "1" Grid.Row = "3"/> <TextBlock Text="Count" Grid.Column = "2" Grid.Row = "2"/> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Grid.Column = "2" Grid.Row = "3" Minimum="{Binding Item/MinCount}" Maximum="{Binding Item/MaxCount}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Value = "{Binding Amount, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding Item/CanIncrease}"/>.../>
<<RowDefinition Height= "1*" /> <RowDefinition Height= "4*" /> <RowDefinition Height= "1*" /> <RowDefinition Height= "1*" />.../>
<<ColumnDefinition Width = "1*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width = "3*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width = "1*"/>.../>

<<Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="3*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Image Source="{Binding Item/StarPath}" Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Visibility="{Binding Item/Mega}"/> <Image Source="{Binding Item/LevelPath}" Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Visibility="{Binding Item/Level}"/> <Image Source="{Binding Item/ItemImagePath}" Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Grid.RowSpan="2"/>.../>
<<ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="3*" />.../>
<<RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" />.../>

<<Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="6*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ContentControl Name="InventoryAreas" Grid.Column="0"> <local:InventoryAreas/> </ContentControl> <GridSplitter Grid.Column="0" Height="Auto" Width="5" VerticalAlignment="Stretch"></GridSplitter> <ContentControl Name="InventoryAreaDisplay" Grid.Column="1"> <local:InventoryView/> </ContentControl> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="6*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ContentControl Name="InventoryAreas" Grid.Column="0"> <local:InventoryAreas/> </ContentControl> <GridSplitter Grid.Column="0" Height="Auto" Width="5" VerticalAlignment="Stretch"></GridSplitter> <ContentControl Name="InventoryAreaDisplay" Grid.Column="1"> <local:InventoryView/> </ContentControl>.../>
<<ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="6*" />.../>

property.name: SearchEverywhereHistoryKey
property.value: InvestigationCollectionView null null nullinvestigation null null nullinvesit null null Extensibility null null ResourceDictionary.xaml FILE file://G:/Users/AsteriskAmpersand/RiderProjects/MHW/MHW Save Editor/src/Resources/ResourcesDictionary.xaml new Investigation(InvestigationThinlayer null null ViewModelLocator null null Currentinvestigation null null BoxstoreCollection null null BoxstoreCollectionView null null

task.summary: Default task
-Fixed checksum algorithm, it works correctly now. -Fixed encryption algorithm, it works correctly now. -Modified GUI in preparation for added editors.
Investigations tab now displays investigation list and controls.
Investigations tab is now element complete. Removed Business logic out of editor, will replace it for a warning of illegality until I learn to data bind as wpf wants things to be data binded.
Fixed Checksum Issues when saving.

Complete Refactoring -Investigation Completely Redone to be a thin layer over hex. -Investigation View Model now properly acts as a View Model for Investigation. -Rewrote the backup function to just use the operating system. -Fixed yet another checksum issue introduced by endianess.
Heavy UI Changes, UI functionality for investigations has been temporarily removed.
Heavy UI Changes, UI functionality for investigations has been temporarily removed.
UI Complete Refactorization. Investigations tab still in progress but save, open, edit steamId and backup work.
Forgot a file
Reached 0.1 features (gained data grid though it can be replaced with a list if performance continues to be an issue) but with a codebase that makes sense and proper classing and user controls.
Fixed resources hard coded path.
Fixes #3 Fixes #4
README Update
README Update
Fixed Unencrypted save not working properly.
Filter now works (without error handling).
Sorting now works.
Sorting refined into a more user friendly UX.
Sorting and Filtering now handle errors properly and simply display an error message and continues.
Autocommit added.
Fixed Edit and Tools in Investigation crashing when no investigation was selected.
Fixed Pasting without clipboard full.
Bounds Checking for Paste and Import at are now checked. Paste will no longer crash when done without a clipboard.
Git cleaning
Git cleaning
Added icon to the application.
Reduced memory leak due to dialog boxes. Changed text boxes to text blocks where possible to reduce memory leaks from cache.
Limited size of text inputs to further cut down on memory leakage.

Clearing an investigation no longer uses the default null investigation but a copy of it. Investigation initialization is now done with a copy of the provided array instead of the array reference itself.
Reimplemented the default sorting algorithm for investigations from n2 to n.
Prevented the DataGrid from allowing users to use it's sort function which breaks investigation back end.
Fixed Investigation title not updating.
More kiddie proofing. Datagrid no longer allows row deletion.
UI Skelleton for Inventory
Almost complete backend of Inventory Editing.

MESSAGE.value: Reached 0.1 features.
Reached 0.1 features (gained data grid though it can be replaced with a list if performance continues to be an issue) but with a codebase that makes sense and proper classing and user controls.
Fixed resources hard coded path.
Fixes #3 Fixes #4
README Update
Fixed Unencrypted save not working properly.
Filter now works (without error handling).
Sorting now works.
Sorting refined into a more user friendly UX.
Sorting and Filtering now handle errors properly and simply display an error message and continues.
Autocommit added.
Fixed Edit and Tools in Investigation crashing when no investigation was selected.
Fixed Pasting without clipboard full.
Bounds Checking for Paste and Import at are now checked. Paste will no longer crash when done without a clipboard.
Git cleaning
Added icon to the application.
Reduced memory leak due to dialog boxes. Changed text boxes to text blocks where possible to reduce memory leaks from cache.
Limited size of text inputs to further cut down on memory leakage.

Clearing an investigation no longer uses the default null investigation but a copy of it. Investigation initialization is now done with a copy of the provided array instead of the array reference itself.
Reimplemented the default sorting algorithm for investigations from n2 to n.
Prevented the DataGrid from allowing users to use it's sort function which breaks investigation back end.
Fixed Investigation title not updating.
More kiddie proofing. Datagrid no longer allows row deletion.
UI Skelleton for Inventory
Almost complete backend of Inventory Editing.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Almost complete backend of Inventory Editing.
